ARABIC: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ إِذَا ٱلسَّمَآءُ ٱنشَقَّتْ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: WHEN THE SKY is cleft asunder,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: When the sky is rent asunder
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: When the heavens are rent asunder
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: When the heaven is split asunder,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: When the heaven is split asunder
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: When the sky is split open
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: When the sky is rent asunder,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: When the heaven is split asunder,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: When the sky is torn apart,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [84:1]   When the heaven is rent asunder,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: And from his narration on the authority of Ibn 'Abbas that he said regarding the interpretation of Allah's saying (When the heaven is split asunder): '(When the heaven is split asunder) by the clouds because of the descent of the Lord-a descent without any modality-and the angels and whatever Allah wills of His command.
